plot: A poor otter family risks everything for the chance to win the cash prize of a talent contest for Christmas.
title: Emmet Otter's Jug-Band Christmas
plot_es: A poor otter family risks everything for the chance to win the cash prize of a talent contest for Christmas.
plot_en: A poor otter family risks everything for the chance to win the cash prize of a talent contest for Christmas.
